description: Information about the donor from which a specimen was collected

type.description: This should always be a donor

age.description: Age in age_units. For embryos, measured since fertilization. For all others, measured since birth.

age_unit.description: The unit in which age is expressed. Must be one of day, week, month, or year.

alcohol_history.description: Number of drinks consumed on a typical day.

ancestry.description: An array of ontology terms from EMBL-EBI's Ancestry Ontology describing ancestral groups, uncategorised ancestral groups, and population isolates.

body_mass_index.description: The body mass index of the donor.

death.description: Information about conditions of death (or info that donor was living at time of collection).

development_stage.description: More detailed (especially for embryos) version of life_stage. e.g. "E9" or "P17" for mouse.

disease.description: Short description of disease status of individual.

genotype.description: Genotype of donor including strain, cross, and genetic modification information. Must be in MGI format for mice.

is_living.description: Should be yes if donor is living at time of sample donation. Otherwise, should be no.

life_stage.description: Should be one of adult, child, embryo, or postpartum.

medication.description: List of medications the donor was currently taking at time of sample donation.

nutritional_state.description: Should be one of normal, fasting, or feeding tube removed.

sex.description: Sex of donor. Should be one of male, female, mixed, or unknown.

smoking_history.description: Estimated number of cigarettes smoked per day and for how many years.

strain.description: The name of th mouse inbred strain. e.g. C57BL/6.

title: donor
